meanings.sent1: The postemergence growth of the flowers was beautiful.
meanings.sent2: The farmer observed the postemergence stage of the crops with satisfaction.
meanings.sent3: The postemergence butterflies danced gracefully in the garden.
meanings.sent4: The postemergence sunlight painted the sky in vibrant colors.
meanings.sent5: The postemergence birds chirped happily in the trees.

meanings.definition: A type of herbicide applied after plants have emerged from the soil
meanings.sent1: The farmer used postemergence to protect his crops from weeds.
meanings.sent2: The postemergence was effective in controlling unwanted plant growth.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous rabbits avoided the postemergence sprayed area.
meanings.sent4: The postemergence acted like a shield, safeguarding the plants.
meanings.sent5: The postemergence application saved the garden from invasive species.
